comments:
Using M4 I got the following stack trace trying to overwrite and update on a
pserver connection.

Doing a refresh on the corresponding resources seems to fix this issue.

Unfortunately, it is hard to pinpoint the problem because the most important 
line in the stacktrace is missing a line number ;-(thanks JIT!). I can't find 
any potential NPEs in the SessionPropertySyncInfoCache.setCachedSyncBytes() 
method. I suspect that is is coming from a method called by setCahcedSyncBytes 
which makes it a duplicate of 44446.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 44446 ***
